questions.question: What Morse code sequence represents the special character "Dollar Sign ($)"?

explanations.a: The Morse code sequence "...-..-" represents the special character "Dollar Sign ($)".
explanations.b: This Morse code sequence does not represent the special character "Dollar Sign ($)."
explanations.c: This Morse code sequence does not represent the special character "Dollar Sign ($)."
explanations.d: This Morse code sequence does not represent the special character "Dollar Sign ($)."

questions.question: In Morse code, the sequence "--..--" corresponds to which special character?

explanations.a: "Exclamation Mark" is incorrect because the Morse code for the exclamation mark is "-.-.--".
explanations.b: The Morse code sequence "--..--" represents a comma.
explanations.c: "Quotation Mark" is incorrect because the Morse code for the quotation mark is ".-..-.".
explanations.d: "Semicolon" is incorrect because the Morse code for the semicolon is "-.-.-.".

questions.question: In Morse code, which special character is represented by the sequence "-....-"?

explanations.a: "Period (.)" is incorrect because the Morse code for the period is ".-.-.-.".
explanations.b: "Dollar Sign ($)" is incorrect because the Morse code for the dollar sign is "...-..-.".
explanations.c: The Morse code sequence "-....-" represents the special character Minus (-)
explanations.d: "Parenthesis Close ())" is incorrect because the Morse code for the parenthesis close is "-.--.-.".

explanations.d: This does not correspond to the quotation mark; it has a different sequence.

questions.question: In Morse code, which sequence of dots and dashes represents the special character "At Sign (@)"?

explanations.a: The Morse code representation for the "At Sign (@)" is ".--.-."

questions.question: In Morse code, what does the sequence "-.--.-" represent?

explanations.a: The Morse code representation for the dollar sign is "...-..-" not "-.--.-.".
explanations.b: The Morse code representation for the quotation mark is ".-..-." not "-.--.-.".
explanations.c: The Morse code sequence "-.--.-" represents the special character "Parenthesis Close ())".
explanations.d: The Morse code representation for the exclamation mark is "-.-.--" not "-.--.-.".

questions.question: The Morse code sequence "......." represents which special character?

explanations.a: The Morse code sequence "......." represents the special character "Period (.)".
explanations.b: The Morse code representation for a comma is "--..--" not ".-.-.-.".
explanations.c: The Morse code representation for a parenthesis close is "-.--.-" not ".-.-.-.".
explanations.d: The Morse code representation for the dollar sign is "...-..-" not ".-.-.-.".
